mapper.sql:
SELECT usro_pk, usro_login, usro_contrasenia, usro_email, usro_nombre, usro_sprt_pk, usro_prto_pk, usro_orga_pk
, (SELECT sprt_codigo FROM tbl_superpuerto_sprt WHERE sprt_pk = usro_sprt_pk) AS sprt_codigo , (SELECT prto_codigo FROM tbl_puerto_prto WHERE prto_pk = usro_prto_pk) AS prto_codigo , (SELECT prmt_parametro FROM tbl_parametro_prmt WHERE prmt_pk = usro_orga_pk) AS orga
, (SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_ext_pk = usro_sprt_pk AND i18n_pref = 'sprt' AND i18n_lang = #{idioma}) AS sprt_nombre , (SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_ext_pk = usro_prto_pk AND i18n_pref = 'prto' AND i18n_lang = #{idioma}) AS prto_nombre , (SELECT prdt_cadena FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE prdt_tpdt_pk = (SELECT tppr_tpdt_pk FROM tbl_tipo_parametro_tppr WHERE tppr_pk = portico.getEntidad('ORGANIZACION')) AND prdt_prvr_pk = ( SELECT prvr_pk FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = usro_orga_pk AND SYSDATE BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, SYSDATE) ) ) AS orga_texto
FROM tbl_usuario_usro
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_usuario_usro (usro_pk, usro_login, usro_contrasenia, usro_email, usro_nombre, usro_sprt_pk, usro_prto_pk, usro_orga_pk) VALUES (#{id}, #{login}, #{contrasenia}, #{email}, #{nombre}, #{sprt.id}, #{prto.id}, #{orga.id})
